## PropertyDefinition.mandatoryEnforced property

If true, data updates that would violate the mandatory requirement from [PropertyDefinition.mandatory](./alfresco-data-model.propertydefinition.mandatory.md) will be rejected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly mandatoryEnforced: boolean;
```
